title: Optical and molecular characteristics of urban wastewater dissolved organic matter: insights into their correlations
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00519H, Paper
Jiangyong Chu, Zhenliang Liao
Urban domestic wastewater is a significant source of dissolved organic matter (DOM) in aquatic environments, critically impacting urban water quality.
